first_para: Ian Mearns (born 21 April 1957) is a British Labour Party politician who is the Prospective Parliamentary Candidate (PPC) for Gateshead. He was first elected at the 2010 general election.

full.extract: Ian Mearns (born 21 April 1957) is a British Labour Party politician who is the Prospective Parliamentary Candidate (PPC) for Gateshead. He was first elected at the 2010 general election.
full.title: Ian Mearns
